verses.text: \w As|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* hart panteth after \w the|strong="H1121"\w* water brooks, So panteth my soul after thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* thirsteth \w for|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w living|strong="H5315"\w* God: \w When|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* come \w and|strong="H4325"\w* appear \w before|strong="H5921"\w* God?

\w My|strong="H7200"\w* tears \w have|strong="H7200"\w* been \w my|strong="H7200"\w* food day \w and|strong="H6440"\w* night, \w While|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H5315"\w* continually say \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, Where \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* God?

\w These|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* remember, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* pour \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul within \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, How \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w went|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* throng, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* led \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house \w of|strong="H3117"\w* God, \w With|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3117"\w* joy \w and|strong="H3117"\w* praise, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* multitude keeping holyday.

\w Why|strong="H5921"\w* art \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* \w cast|strong="H8210"\w* \w down|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*? \w And|strong="H1004"\w* \add why\add* art \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* disquieted \w within|strong="H1004"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*? Hope \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* God; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w praise|strong="H8426"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \add For\add* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* help \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* countenance.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w cast|strong="H3034"\w* \w down|strong="H7817"\w* \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*: \w Therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* remember \w thee|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Jordan, \w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Hermons, \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* hill Mizar.

Deep calleth \w unto|strong="H5315"\w* deep \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* noise \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w thy|strong="H2142"\w* waterfalls: \w All|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H2142"\w* waves \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w thy|strong="H2142"\w* billows \w are|strong="H2022"\w* gone \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

\add Yet\add* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H6963"\w* \w command|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* lovingkindness \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* day-time; \w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* night \w his|strong="H3605"\w* song \w shall|strong="H6963"\w* \w be|strong="H6963"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \add Even\add* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prayer \w unto|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* God \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* rock, Why hast thou forgotten \w me|strong="H5973"\w*? Why \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6680"\w* mourning \w because|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* oppression \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* enemy?

As \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sword \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H7911"\w* bones, mine adversaries reproach \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, While \w they|strong="H4100"\w* continually say \w unto|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, \w Where|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w thy|strong="H7911"\w* God?

Why art \w thou|strong="H3117"\w* cast down, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul? \w And|strong="H3117"\w* why art \w thou|strong="H3117"\w* disquieted within \w me|strong="H3117"\w*? Hope \w thou|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* God; \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w yet|strong="H3605"\w* praise \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \add Who is\add* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* help \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* countenance, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* God.
